snippet: In the wake of the ACE settlement, the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau needs to attack the entire payday industry.
abstract: Editorial welcomes new rules being drawn up by federal Consumer Financial Protection Bureau to protect borrowers from unscrupulous payday lenders; outlines ways that the bureau could attack entire payday lending industry.
lead_paragraph: In the wake of the ACE settlement, the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau needs to attack the entire payday industry.

headline.main: Payday Lenders Set the Debt Trap
headline.print_headline: Payday Lenders Set the Debt Trap
